key_risks: Legal and regulatory risks, including lawsuits over rent hikes, late fees, and background checks
Market sensitivity to economic conditions, such as employment rates and housing trends
Regulatory risks from rent control laws and zoning regulations
controversies: Rent hike scam settlement for misleading tenants and imposing illegal rent hikes
Antitrust lawsuit alleging collusion with RealPage to inflate rents
Class-action lawsuits over unfair late fees and improper background checks
environmental_issues: Older properties may require significant upgrades to meet modern environmental standards
social_issues: Complaints and lawsuits related to tenant screening processes, including allegations of discriminatory practices
Negative publicity from handling tenant disputes and rent increases
governance_issues: Reliance on joint ventures and partnerships for large-scale developments introduces financial and operational risks
